glossary.definition: Report showing course completion rates, progress, and statistics
Report showing enrollment counts, trends, and demographics
Report showing individual or team progress through courses

business_rules: Admin reports show all data within their organization
Manager reports show only data for their team
Learner reports show only their own data
Reports can be filtered by date range, course, user, status
Reports can be exported as CSV
Report generation should complete within 30 seconds
Large reports should be paginated or generated asynchronously
Report data is scoped to organization for multi-tenant isolation
calculations_or_formulas: Average time to complete = sum(time_to_complete) / count(completed enrollments)
invariants: Report data must be scoped to user's organization
Report data must respect role-based access (admin sees all, manager sees team, learner sees self)
Report generation must not block other operations
Report data must be accurate and consistent
edge_cases: Report requested for very large dataset (thousands of enrollments)
Report requested for date range with no data
User role changes while report is being generated
Course deleted while report includes it
Concurrent report requests for same data
user_journeys: Admin navigates to reports → selects report type → applies filters → views report → exports CSV
Manager views team dashboard → filters by team → views progress report → exports for team
acceptance_criteria_suggestions: Reports are generated correctly with applied filters
Report data is scoped correctly by role and organization
CSV export includes all report data
Report generation completes within acceptable time
Report data is accurate and consistent
open_questions: What is the maximum report size? Should large reports be paginated?
Should reports be cached? For how long?
Should report generation be asynchronous for large datasets?
assumptions: Report data is aggregated from enrollment, progress, and course tables
Report generation is synchronous for small datasets, asynchronous for large
CSV export includes all columns visible in report
